title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Biden: Get vaccinated or wear the mask. Montage of Biden saying get vaccinated or wear a mask. Liberals still confused, afraid of virus, afraid people without masks will infect them even if they're vaccinated. Rush begged us not to accept the "new normal". Liberal media praises Liz Cheney, the new Mitt Romney. Rush picked out Elise Stefanik as a rising star. SCOTUS considers case on "most offensive word". Rush on freedom of speech. Open Line Friday callers. Rush on deregulation and lower taxes.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

The Limbaugh Middle East Peace Plan: Let Israel defeat the Palestinians. Todd talks to Rodney Stotts, man featured in EIB High Note earlier this week. Rodney explains how training falcons saved him from a life of crime and drugs. Trucker who called Rush knows more about energy policy than Bidens' whole cabinet combined. Road Trip with Rush: Creedence Clearwater Revival.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Rush predicted the demise of Ellen DeGeneres. Open Line Friday callers. The Offended, the Fonz and a fish. EIB High Note: Dan's Bake Sale. Caller on the prospects of the Cold Civil War turning hot. We go back to 1993 and hear Rush talking about the upcoming Dan's Bake Sale in Fort Collins, Colorado. More than 25,000 people showed up to a bake sale held by a Rush fan who wanted to raise money to purchase a subscription to The Limbaugh Letter. Caller: President Biden never says "God Bless America", he says "God bless our troops" instead. A time for choosing.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
